SuperExtender.io

Super Extender for Chrome: 
The ultimate, easy, instant chrome extensions manager

---FEATURES OVERVIEW---

ğŸ¯ Smart Extension Management
>> One-click enable/disable for any extension
>> Quick search and filter extensions

>> Secure removal of unwanted extensions

ğŸ“ Smart Group Management
>> Create custom groups of extensions
>> Save frequently used extension combinations
>> Quick switching between different extension sets
>> Drag-and-drop group reordering
>> Automatic group state preservation

ğŸŒ Multi-Language Support
